group_1.textLeft: Hmm...
It's actually pretty hard to pick something@when it's not love chocolate, huh?

group_1.textRight: You had a crush on her for four years, didn't you?

group_1.textLeft: That's right.
The first time I picked out chocolate@for her after realizing how I felt...
I was sooooo super anxious about it...!
After all, if you're confessing your feelings,@the chocolate has to be homemade, right?
But she was always good at baking and stuff.
I'd never done anything like that before...
So I figured it'd be better to give her@something ready-made than a failure.
I borrowed allowance in advance from my mom and@bought a premade one, and stuff to make my own.
In the end, I burnt the@homemade chocolate that year.
...Oh!@It was this one!
Well, it's not an exact copy of what I gave her,@but pretty similar.
She was so happy with it that I felt happy, too...
(I couldn't tell her how I really felt...)
So I gave that to her every year...
I never got to give her a homemade one.
Every year...@I kept telling myself I was going to do it...
(But I was never able to show her how I felt.)
(Still, it was so nice to see her happy...)
Well...enough with the memories!
It's time to pick one.

group_1.textRight: What about the one from before?

group_1.textLeft: That was...the one with the keychain?
Well, it's a loaded gift. I started giving that@to her when I realized I was in love, right?
Like, I should go with something@I never gave her before.
Something I'd never have given her@when we were in love.
It's just like you said.
It's not easy to erase those "I love you" feelings.
...Four years has GOT to be too long@to crush on someone.
But...I don't plan on leaving things like this forever.
I've got to get closure, even if just a little at a time.
I think it's time I draw the line here,@and then someday...
I hope I'll be able to be really, truly happy for her.
Because I care about her.@I really do.
(So, if she...)
(If she still cares about me as a childhood friend...)
(Then that alone will make me happy.)
Today will mark the first step!

group_1.textRight: You know exactly what you want to do.

group_1.textLeft: Well, sometimes I get a little lost along the way.
(Hmm...? A box set of novelty chocolates?)
...Okay!@Let's do this!
